sentences.sContent: There was an electricity black-out in a large area in the north of the country.
sentences.sCn: 该国北方有一大片地区都停电了。

synos.tran: 灯火管制；灯火熄灭；暂时的意识丧失

remMethod.val: 来自词组black out(熄灯； 停电)

trans.tranCn: 无线电通讯中断， 信号消失
trans.tranOther: a period of darkness caused by a failure of the electricity supply
